data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Libonatti, María Laura, Ruta, Rafał (2013): Review of the Argentinean species of Pseudomicrocara Armstrong (Coleoptera: Scirtidae). Zootaxa 3718 (2): 137-157, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3718.2.3
